review_title: Blue Snowball replacement. An inclusive package that offers all necessities and more
reviews: My Blue Snowball failed and I had to scramble to get a new microphone. I landed on this one. The mic quality is comparable to that of a Blue Snowball. With the foam padding off and without the pop filter, you can pick up more of the bass in whatever you are recording, which is what I've opted to do. Setup is just plug and play. The stand seems very sturdy, much more so than a discrete one that I've bought for around $20-30. By far the best addition is the shock mount. When I used to use my Blue Snowball on the other mic arm, my every movement on my desk (keypresses, picking up and putting down a mug) would be translated into reverb and make it really annoying for anyone that I was in a call with. However, with this shock mount, this doesn't happen anymore. I don't hear anything besides my voice in the recordings. Overall, for the money (the whole package costs the same amount as the Blue Snowball alone), the value here is terrific. I really can't be more satisfied.

Works well, doesn't get overly hot to the touch like other adapter that I've used have. Use it to run a 144hz monitor along with many USBs. The build looks premium and feels premium. Metal construction is quite nice.

It takes around 2 hours to charge up fully using an iPad brick and the included cable. The construction is a matte plastic that surprisingly does not leave fingerprints or oil stains when you touch it. The pack itself feels sturdy. The 2.1 amp charging is quite fast, although not as fast as plugging directly into a fast charging brick in the wall, obviously. Good value.

This stand has a plastic coating over it, however is primarily made of metal. You can certainly feel how rigid and heavy the stand is. It seems very stable, holding my XPS 15 with ease. The bottom is coated with rubber, that allows it to stay in place no matter what bumps into it. The only thing is that it is a bit of a fingerprint magnet, but other than that, it has been great.

For 90 bucks, you get a microphone, a pop filter, a stand, and a regular layover filter. The microphone's sound quality is comparable to that of a Blue Snowball. The stand feels very sturdy and made of premium materials. The pop filter is alright, but I personally opt to use the layover filter instead. Great bang for the buck and would highly recommend.

The stand seems study enough. It comes with an adapter for the Blue Snowball and ample room to hang a pop filter off of. Only concern is the long term durability, but we will have to see. For the price I would recommend it.

The value proposition here is great. The inclusion of 2 bulbs each with a remote is very impressive given the price. The only complaint I really have is that it seems like all these RGB products use the same channel for their remotes, meaning when I press something on the remote, something happens on a different product. Otherwise, the product is solid and does what it needs to do.

The adhesive on the back of the strip makes it easy to mount anywhere. I chose to mount it on the small wooden underside of my bed frame, where it has yet to sag after a week now, appearing to be strong. The inclusion of two light strips is nice, but is only really useful if you want an extremely long singular strip. If you choose to use them separately, you must purchase another wall plug and transformer. Otherwise, the value proposition is alright and it does what it needs to well.

It does what it needs to do at a very low cost. It's a great little device that doesn't protrude out of the device like some other alternatives do. The speed is pretty standard with what you would usually get with an adapter of this size. Nothing noteworthy, but this small thing sure does work and does it at a very compelling price.

review_title: Really does insulate better than any mug that I've ever used.
reviews: Originally, I got this mug because I felt like it added to the minimalism and monochrome color scheme that I follow for my office setup. I just needed a standard and aesthetically pleasing mug. However, I'm genuinely blown away with how good this mug is. The construction is truly impeccable. It seems durable, the glossy finish is a bit of a fingerprint magnet but isn't too bad, and the insulation is truly out of this world. Pouring boiling hot water right out of a kettle into this cup for my morning tea does not heat the exterior in the slightest. You cannot feel ANY change in temperature on the outside of the cup. I'm truly shocked with how good this thing performs, and I would highly recommend it for any daily hot beverage consumers.

After using it a bunch, all ports seem to be working. The product works great with my XPS 15 9560, where I use the HDMI out, ethernet, and have the USB 3.0 port hooked up to another USB hub. This hub seems to be able to carry all the bandwidth to run all the ports simultaneously. The hub is made completely out of metal, which really adds to the premium feel compare to some other plastic competitors that I have experienced. Overall would highly recommend it. The price tag can be justified by the premium feel and very high functionality.

review_title: Quality is alright, does what it needs to do.
reviews: The construction is mostly plastic with an aluminum coating. It does what it needs to do fine. The charging pass through works fine without seeming to be any slower. At this price point, I would have liked to have seen a bit better of build quality (more metal), but the product itself works fine.

review_title: Decent quality, has a hard time laying flat
reviews: Like the title says, the product feels and smells like leather. The double sided different textures allows for more versatility. I thought it was going to be a fingerprint/grease magnet, however it isn't and seems quite easy to clean (wipe it down with a damp rag). My only complaint is that it has a hard time laying flat even after trying to remedy.

The charger's sleek and modern design allows it to fit into any kind of setup. I found the charging rates to be as good as what you would get from a fast charging cable, which is impressive given the convience provided by the wireless. It makes it easy to just pick up your phone and set it down frequently without having a cable in the way. The angle makes it much easier to see notifications while working at your desk, an inconvenience I had when I had a regular charging pad that sat flat on the table. The product itself is a bit of a fingerprint magnet, but it is otherwise a very recommendable product.

review_title: Really great for creating a clean and minimal desk setup
reviews: This product really cleaned up my desk setup. It works perfectly in tandem with a long corded power bar, allowing your whole setup to only have one exposed power cord to the wall. Great for the price point.

Great value. For the 15 bucks you pay for it, you can't really go wrong. The carbon fibre seems to be quite durable and the straps have no signs of any fraying after use. My only complaint is that it is a fingerprint magnet, but that's inevitable on a glossy back wallet.

Using a steamer has really made my life much more convenient. Rather than taking the time to take out and do the necessary setup for using an iron, just hanging up my clothes and running them with the steamer has seem to have resulted in the same effect. The steamer also damages the threading on clothes less than the iron, which is a nice touch too. There is really no going wrong with this steamer at this pricepoint.

review_title: This was truly the best purchase ever.
reviews: The value was truly amazing (12 pillowcases for 15 dollars). I now change my pillowcase every day, which helped a lot in stopping my breakouts. Would highly recommend to people who struggle with acne to give this a shot. A lot cheaper than buying smaller packs/singular pillow cases.

Sometimes the ports have issues where port 0 registers as port 3 or other combinations like that. But with a bit of tinkering you can always get it to work. It does what it needs to do at a pretty good price. Not really any complaints here.

review_title: Hands down the best wireless earbuds that I have ever used.
reviews:
The sound quality is amazing. Using the downloadable app, you can change any aspect of the equalizer you want to your tasting. The headphones have an astonishing level of bass to them if you set it that way. The battery life is alright (~8 hours).

The only reason why I'm giving these headphones a 4/5 is because of the proprietary charger that it requires. It uses a charging clip that connects via micro USB. This clip is so easy to lose and the only way of getting another one is through buying the accessory pack via Jaybird's website, where you get a bunch of stuff you didn't need (as you can't just buy the charging clip separately).

review_title: Does what it needs to do at a good price.
reviews: This was one of the cheapest gigabit ethernet adapters I could find, and it certainly delivers. After doing extensive speedtesting on my gigabit network, it hits those speeds. Would recommend for someone who is just trying to get a cheap and easy solution to a laptop which doesn't have an ethernet port on it (my case).

After swapping to this SD card from some shoddy Lexar one from a couple years ago, I immediately noticed a huge increase in the video quality of my 60D. The speeds are as fast as promised after doing some testing. Would highly recommend.

review_title: Durable case, but is a fingerprint magnet.
reviews: Case looks nice when kept extremely clean. Every fingerprint shows up on this thing. Scratches and scuffs don't appear much to my experience and it keeps the phone very protected. Has ridges on the front to prevent screen damage from drops.

This is my go to product now. The feeling of hydration seems to last a lot longer compared to cheaper alternatives and seems to work more effectively under harsh weather conditions (Canadian winters). Would highly recommend splurging on this product rather than a cheaper one. I have been using mine for months now, so I can vouch for how long it lasts.

The humidifier is genuinely effective. It is perfect for college dorm rooms and other small areas where dehumidifying would add to comfort. Beware though, it is quite loud. I couldn't fall asleep with it on.

review_title: For the price, you really cannot go wrong.
reviews: The hoodie is decently thick. It's like any other typical screen-printed hoodie minus the design. The quality is about what you would expect. If you are just looking for a plain black hoodie, you can't go wrong here.

These socks are prefect for low cut sneakers where you want to show a bit of your ankle. The padding inside provides a lot of comfort during wear. The socks themselves are quite thin, but given the seasons where you would usually wear these, that's not something to complain about. The material is very soft.
Just a basic kettle. At this price, you can't really go wrong. Does what it needs to do pretty quickly.

This lightbulb is one of the cheapest ways into RGB lighting. Some of the modes on the app are quite gimmicky and don't work that well (aka changing colours to the sound of music), but for just displaying solid colours and preset patterns, it works just fine. And for the money, you really can't complain.

review_title: For the money, there is no going wrong with these.
reviews: The sound quality is overall pretty good. Not as good as m50x but still pretty good. The bass is not as punchy as I would personally like. The headphones themselves are quite light and easy to wear for extended periods of time. Overall a great pair of headphones and very worth it.
The product comes with a lot of quantity. However, I found that the hold was very weak, where even the slightest of wind could offset your whole styling. Cannot really recommend it.
This is a great hoodie for someone who just wants many different coloured hoodies without spending a lot. The hoodie itself is quite thin, but there's no room to complain given the price point.
Sticking this to the bottom of a bottle really makes it look quite flashy and cool. Many friends were amazed of how it looked. It makes to bottle look much more expensive than it really is.

For the 40 bucks I paid, I am absolutely satisfied with what I got. Personally, I use my device as a permanent music streaming device connected to my speakers, and it works great for that. It is also very convenient for setting timers when cooking and acting as an alarm to wake you up. The product has truly made my life so much easier in many small ways. Could not recommend this any more.

review_title: Helped keep my breakouts under control
reviews: This cream is great to apply before sleep. It really helped me with my acne surprising fast (took 2-3 days for pimples to more of less disappear). The only complaint I have is the quantity is a bit low for how much you pay. Other than that, a great product.

review_title: Great product, but came with a a dead fly in the bag.
reviews: The product works as intended and is a great value at this price point. However I cannot vouch for the hygiene during the packaging of this product, as there was a dead fly inside of mine.

I've started wearing these throughout the day and I feel as if I can even concentrate better with them on. Sleep quality has definitely improved. The yellow tint is strange at first but you quickly adapt to it and don't even notice it after a while.

For the amount that was paid, a lot of clips were included. However, the quality of the individual clips was quite subpar. Specifically, the adhesive material did not create a strong bond with the targeted surface, causing the clips to detach after a few days. Unfortunately for that reason, I cannot recommend these clips.
So far the best paste I've used it. It does not give much shine and has immense amounts of hold when you use it right out of the shower. Best used when hair is wet or damp.

review_title: Has a very strong smell to it, but it does the job.
reviews: This shampoo has an extremely strong chemical smell to it that lingers after the shower. But it really does clean like no other shampoo. It got rid of my dandruff and made my scalp feel as clean as it has ever felt. The value is a bit low, as you don't get too much quantity for the amount you pay. The product is overall good, but personally the smell is a deal-breaker for me.

review_title: It's cheap, both in price and quality.
reviews: You get what you pay for. The controller works perfectly fine, but the quality just isn't there. The plastic body feels very cheap and the buttons have a cheap feel to them. But for 20 bucks, you can't really complain.

review_title: Works but came with a strong plastic smell.
reviews: It came with a plastic smell as you would encounter with cheaper items from China. After airing it out for a couple of days it was fine and functional. Does what you would expect with a pretty good value.

review_title: Really cleans up your setup on the cheap.
reviews: The monitor stand really cleans up my setup. Me being a student, I often run out of desk space when I have a bunch of papers placed all over. Having no monitor stand really opens up more of my desk, as I am now able to slide things underneath, opening up space that I never had before. The mount itself was very easy to install and feels very sturdy. No sagging when using the tilt function and all joints feel properly movable. Very great value.
Toner quantity is absolutely huge. Been using it for half a year and I'm still at an excess. The quality seems to be the same as the OEM one. Highly recommend it.

review_title: Great value from this 30 dollar SSD.
reviews: The SSD is nothing special, but it was $29.99. At this price point, it is an amazing value. Its great for reviving old computers that were chugging from their old mechanical hard drives. Personally, I threw it in an enclosure and used it as an external drive, using it to offload videos from my camera's SD card during vacations with the family. It works great for that.

review_title: Works, however would recommend the regular, non-charcoal over this.
reviews: I find that the regular version works better than this charcoal edition. However, both work well. The charcoal leaves some residue on your face after application, however it is easily rinsed off with a bit of water.

review_title: The absolute best value wireless mouse ever.
reviews: This mouse is simply amazing. Coming from a g303, this mouse is lighter and has equally as good of a sensor. The battery life is amazing (3 months in and logitech's software still says I have 5/5 battery left). The lack of RGB is understandable given the price point of this mouse, being the cheapest wireless one that logitech offers, but I'm okay with it, as the RGB would add additional weight to the device (and every bit of savings count). If you are looking for the best value oriented performance wireless mouse on the market, look no more.

I got this band to keep track of my heart rate. However, the reading seems to be quite inaccurate. The band would report my resting heart rate to be 150, which is highly inaccurate. The band also does not send info to the app unless it is on, and it goes to sleep every couple of seconds, requiring you to continuously wake it up quite often. Overall, I cannot recommend this band, as there are many other alternatives at this price-point that may be more effective.

Installation was pretty simple, took about an hour. The included tool helps with measuring the spaces between the numbers, making accurate placings easy. Makes my setup look much more elite and minimal. Clock ticks a bit, but it's far from loud.
This clenser single-handedly stopped me from breaking out. It's not too harsh but not too gentle. It's much better than the clinique ones that I used prior to this one. Cannot recommend this more.

After reading many other reviews, I decided to give it a shot. Personally, I found the moisturizer to be somewhat weak and liquidy, requiring a lot for any noticeable effect. Caused me to break out a bit.
Hat seems to be very durable and woven with a decent amount of quality. At the price point, there is really nothing to complain about.
